pageDescription: Tips and methods to take your character from start to endgame efficiently.

heroics.title: Heroics
heroics.text1: Heroics are repeatable missions available on each planet. They can be done <hl>solo</hl> or in a group.
heroics.text2: They offer good XP and useful rewards like gear and credits. They're one of the most efficient ways to level.
heroics.text3: You can pick up all Heroics from the terminal on the <hl>Fleet</hl> and be transported directly to the planet.

flashpoints.title: Flashpoints
flashpoints.text1: Flashpoints are instanced dungeons with 3 difficulty modes:

modes.name: Solo/Story
modes.desc: Playable alone with a companion droid. Ideal for the story.

modes.name: Veteran
modes.desc: Requires a group of 4 players. No specific composition needed.

modes.name: Master
modes.desc: Hardest mode. Requires tank, healer, and 2 DPS.

flashpoints.text2: Flashpoints give plenty of XP and gear. Use the <hl>Group Finder</hl> to find a group.

pvp.title: PvP / Warzones
pvp.text1: Warzones are PvP battles with objectives (capture points, carry the ball, etc.).
pvp.text2: They give reasonable XP and are a fun alternative to PvE for leveling.
pvp.text3: You can queue through the <hl>Group Finder</hl> at any time.

xpBoosts.title: XP Boosts
xpBoosts.text1: There are several XP boosts available in the game:

boosts.name: Major XP Boost
boosts.desc: Consumable that doubles XP gained for 3 hours.

boosts.name: Guild XP Bonus
boosts.desc: Guilds can activate XP bonuses for all members.

boosts.name: Double XP Events
boosts.desc: Periodic events that double all XP gained.

boosts.name: Legacy Perks
boosts.desc: Legacy perks that increase XP from various sources.

planetaryMissions.title: Planetary Missions
planetaryMissions.text1: Each planet has side missions that complement your class story.
planetaryMissions.text2: They're not mandatory but give extra XP and help understand the planet's lore.

tips.title: Efficient Leveling Tips
tipsList: Focus on the class story — it gives more than enough XP to progress.
Use XP Boosts during Double XP Events to maximize gains.
Heroics from the Fleet are the fastest way to level outside the story.
Don't worry about gear until endgame — equip items with the green arrow.
Veteran Flashpoints through Group Finder give good XP while waiting in queue.
Activate all Legacy XP Perks as soon as possible.
